Home.title: The Simpliest Way to Manage Your Budget
Home.subtitle: Take control of your spending and saving with our budget app
Home.subtitle2: With Budgetplex, you can easily track your spending and saving, and make a budget that works for you.
Home.ans: The last app you'll ever need to manage your budget.
Home.ans1: Record transaction with ease, categorize your spending, add notes if needed.
Home.ans2: Automatically calculate your expected salary with only a few inputs.
Home.ans3: Easily track your bills, specify due dates, amounts and note if needed.
Home.ans4: Set up your financial goals, track your progress and plan monthly to achieve your goals.
Home.ans5: Design Your Financial Future with Intent - Effortlessly Set and Track Budget Goals, From Debt Repayment to Vacation Saving, Empowering You with the Tools to Achieve Your Financial Dreams Through Detailed Planning and Progress Monitoring

SigninPage.title: Sign in
SigninPage.signUp: Don't have an account? Sign up now!

SignupPage.title: Sign Up
SignupPage.usernameAlreadyExistsError: Username already exists, please try another one
SignupPage.minUsernameError: Username must be at least 3 characters
SignupPage.maxUsernameError: Username must be at most 15 characters
SignupPage.emailAlreadyExistsError: Email already exists, please try another one
SignupPage.minPasswordError: Password must be at least 6 characters
SignupPage.maxPasswordError: Password must be at most 30 characters
SignupPage.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in now!

AddTransaction.title: Add Transaction
AddTransaction.description: Add a new transaction to your account
AddTransaction.maxNoteError: Note must be at most 1000 characters
AddTransaction.minTitleError: Title must be at least 3 characters
AddTransaction.maxTitleError: Title must be at most 30 characters

BillInfo.title: Bill Manager
BillInfo.description: Manage your bills, set up reminders for upcoming bills, specify due dates and amounts, and automatically integrate these costs into your monthly expenses for flawless financial planning and peace of mind
BillInfo.remainingBill: Remaining bills to pay this month
BillInfo.addBillDescription: Add a new bill to your account
BillInfo.noBillYet: No bill yet, why not add one?
BillInfo.minBillNameError: Bill name must be at least 3 characters
BillInfo.maxBillNameError: Bill name must be at most 30 characters
BillInfo.minBillAmountError: Bill amount must be at least 1
BillInfo.maxBillAmountError: Bill amount must be at most 1,000,000,000,000,000
BillInfo.maxBillNoteError: Note must be at most 1000 characters
BillInfo.maxFrequencyError: Frequency must be at most 120 (months OR 10 years)
BillInfo.deleteConfimation: Are you sure you want to delete this bill?, this action can't be undone

Salary.getStarted: Get started with our salary manager
Salary.getStartedDescription: Setup your hourly rate, overtime rate and date of your payday
Salary.shiftDateError: Invalid shift date, please select a date
Salary.hoursWorkedError: Invalid hours worked, please put a correct hour
Salary.overtimeError: Invalid overtime hours, please put a correct hour
Salary.addShiftDescription: Record your shift and overtime hours to calculate your expected earning
Salary.shiftAddingError: Error adding shift, please try again later
Salary.updateSalarySettingsDescription: Update your salary settings, updating your salary settings will reset your expected earning depending on your new settings
Salary.salaryHistoryDescription: Note that the salary history is based on your salary settings, if you update your salary settings, the expected earning will be recalculated based on your new settings

FinancialGoals.addGoalDescription: Add a new financial goal to your account
FinancialGoals.minNameError: Goal name must be at least 1 characters
FinancialGoals.maxNameError: Goal name must be at most 100 characters
FinancialGoals.maxDescriptionError: Description must be at most 1000 characters
FinancialGoals.removeGoalConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {goalName}? this action can't be undone!
FinancialGoals.planMonthlyDescription: Telling us how much you want to spend on this goal each month will help us how long it will take to achieve this goal
FinancialGoals.planMonthlyInput: Amount you can spend on this goal each month
FinancialGoals.planMonthlyMessage: You can achieve this in {months} months

SettingsPage.maxMessageError: Username must be at most 15 characters
SettingsPage.sameUsernameError: Your new username can't be the same as your current username
SettingsPage.emailExistsError: Email already exists, please try another one
SettingsPage.emailHelper: Your email is used to recover your account, you'll have to sign in again after changing your email.
SettingsPage.sameEmailError: Your new email can't be the same as your current email
SettingsPage.passwordHelper: Your password is used to sign in to your account, you shouldn't share it with anyone
SettingsPage.samePasswordError: Your new password can't be the same as your current password
SettingsPage.minPasswordError: Password must be at least 6 characters
SettingsPage.maxPasswordError: Password must be at most 30 characters
SettingsPage.currencySignHelper: Your currency sign is used to display your currency in the app
SettingsPage.invalidCurrencySignError: Invalid currency sign, you can create your own custom currency sign by 1-5 characters
